nodes.text: Marutz was one of the first four Celestials responsible for the creation of Skyriver. Marutz, Wutzek, Xurz and their leader Lluxos tended to the galaxy and its first lifeforms after its formation and helped to ensure that their evolution and progression went accordingly through the wisdom of the Four Precepts.

Marutz and his brethren would eventually depart when the galaxy's inhabitants began to wage war amongst themselves. Wutzek however would be imprisoned by an evil cult known as the Five who were in service to Wutzek's own corrupted daughter Tilotny, otherwise known as Onrai.
